capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Responsible for the end-to-end management of grant programs, ensuring projects are financially monitored and achieve intended outcomes.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Leads the delivery of state-wide planning and implementation of grant projects, requiring effective prioritization and planning skills.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Addresses complex issues with grantees, requiring analytical skills to develop practical solutions.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Accountable for administering a large volume of projects, adhering to guidelines and policies.

capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Guides team members on grant processes and decision-making, developing their capabilities.

capabilities.name: Inspire Direction and Purpose
capabilities.description: Communicates goals and priorities to team members and stakeholders, inspiring engagement with the grant program's objectives.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Establishes and maintains stakeholder relationships through effective communication and negotiation.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Engages stakeholders and ensures consistency in outcomes through skilled negotiation and influence.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Oversees the end-to-end management of grantee projects, requiring advanced project management skills.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.description: Overseeing grant projects from inception to completion, ensuring they meet governance and financial monitoring requirements.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Building and maintaining relationships with internal and external stakeholders, including effective communication and negotiation.

skills.name: Budget Management
skills.description: Monitoring program expenditure and managing budgets to ensure financial efficiency.

skills.name: Grants Administration
skills.description: Understanding and applying NSW Government grants administration guidelines to manage the grant lifecycle.

generalRole.title: Senior Project Officer - Grants Management
generalRole.description: This role involves the advanced management of grant programs, focusing on environmental projects under the NSW Coastal Management Framework. It requires a blend of project management, stakeholder engagement, and financial oversight, making it distinct in its focus on environmental grant administration.
